alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Morgan; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Morgan, central Rowan and western Elliott Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rodburn, or over Morehead, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pelfrey and Haldeman around 515 PM EDT. Vale and Craney around 525 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wagner, Wagner Store, Hamm, Elliottville, Leisure, Minor, Blairs Mills, Fannin Valley, Farley, Lytten, Little Sandy and Stark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
